errors.lastNameLength: Last name is minimum of 2 letters

text.descriptionText: Write a new task to complete
text.modalDeleteTask: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
text.modalDeleteComment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
text.textSubtitle: TodoList is the project I created to keep my usual task list ordered.I created this application with current technologies: HTML, CSS, JS, Angular, Firebase
text.textItemHeaderAddTask: add new tasks to the list;
text.textItemHeaderCompletedTask: mark completed tasks (in this case, they are immediately excluded from the list
text.textItemHeaderActiveTask: of active tasks and transferred to completed);
text.textItemHeaderSwitchTask: switch between cases (in process, completed and new);
text.textItemHeaderAddComments: add comments to tasks, as well as delete or edit them;
text.textItemHeaderFirebase: automatically save to-do lists in firebase.
